projetos.descricao: System for IoT-Based Logistics Optimization in Manufacturing. This project aims to streamline logistics processes by integrating IoT devices to monitor and optimize the flow of materials and products.
System for Sustainable Food Organization and Consumption. This project focuses on reducing food waste and promoting sustainable consumption by connecting consumers with local food sources.
Web App to search for Pokémon information. This project provides a comprehensive database of Pokémon, allowing users to search for and learn about different Pokémon species.
IoT Solution to Locate and Monitor Assets. This project uses ESP32 microcontrollers to track and monitor the location and status of assets in real-time.
Web Game to guess the character from Hunger Games. This project is an interactive game where players guess the identity of characters from the Hunger Games series based on clues.
Web System for a Clothing Store. This project is an e-commerce platform designed for a clothing store, featuring product listings, shopping cart functionality, and secure checkout.
